attributes.action: DNA Databank to Include Aggravated Cruelty to Animals
attributes.additional_details: This is a law being passed in the US. It is important that the UK does the same thing. This is what the Senator sponsoring it says; It has been proven that cruelty to animals is one of the biggest predictors of future violent crimes. By requiring these offenders to submit DNA samples we advance our law enforcement’s ability to solve these cases and protect future victims,” said Lentol. “Of course, we also guard the well being and health of animals. They deserve the utmost protection too.
